reviewText: The DVD content was great but the  three ring binder was all to pieces, had to go buy a three ring binder to hold them, also found out that I could have bought a new one from another source for two dollars more. Will not buy anything from this source again.
Great ready to be knocked over by this great teaching. Perry Stone reveals things that the people in the 1st century would have known but we don't hear about now.
The best prophecy teacher out there today, and so thorough and biblical and interesting. Highly recommended.
So informative and interesting. Highly recommend if you want to know about end time prophecy!

It is unfortunate that Perry Stone speak too fast his speed is really regrettable and make the study a bit challenging.
Other than that the buyer need to be aware that it is quite a lot informations to digest per CD.
Great inverstment as there are very few pastors out there with this dept of knowledge on the last book of the Holy Bible for home study.

Item had until the 9th of this month to arrive. In all honesty I thought it might arrive around then., But it came today to my excitement. it was cheaper including the expedited shipment from any where else I saw on a regular shipment bases. And was perfectly packaged.  The Quality of the material howbeit not up to the seller is also superb. High quality, large multi-DVD (7) package beautifully tucked into corresponding sleeves, a Spiral bound Study syllabus with systematic information. Great job. Would definitely by from Monroeville Books again.
I love Perry Stone's teaching of Revelation. Opened my eyes to many things and I couldn't agree more. Looking forward to more of what the Lord has for me.
